languageInfo.text2: • Some content from partners may still appear in their original language.
languageInfo.text3: • You can change your language preference at any time.

bankAccounts.addBankAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to add this bank account?
bankAccounts.aboutBankAccountsText: Bank accounts are used to receive payments for completed jobs. You can add multiple accounts and set one as default.
bankAccounts.aboutBankAccountsText2: Your bank information is securely stored and protected.

availability.setAvailabilityDescription: Set your weekly availability schedule. This helps customers know when you're available for jobs.
availability.howAvailabilityWorksDescription1: Your availability is used to show customers when you can accept jobs.
availability.howAvailabilityWorksDescription2: You'll only receive job requests during your available hours.
availability.howAvailabilityWorksDescription3: You can update your availability at any time.
availability.howAvailabilityWorksDescription5: • Your availability is used to show customers when you can accept jobs.
availability.howAvailabilityWorksDescription6: • You'll only receive job requests during your available hours.
availability.howAvailabilityWorksDescription7: • You can update your availability at any time.

serviceArea.setServiceAreaDescription: Set your service area to define where you're available to work. This helps match you with nearby jobs.
serviceArea.aboutServiceAreaDescription: • Service areas help customers find you by defining your service area. You can set a radius around your current location or a custom radius.
serviceArea.aboutServiceAreaDescription2: • Your service area is used to show customers when you're available to work.
serviceArea.aboutServiceAreaDescription3: • You can update your service area at any time.
serviceArea.aboutServiceAreaDescription4: • Your service area determines which job requests you'll receive.
serviceArea.aboutServiceAreaDescription5: • You can update your service area at any time.
serviceArea.aboutServiceAreaDescription6: • A larger radius means more potential jobs but longer travel times.

partners.connectWithPartnerCompaniesToReceiveJobA: Connect with partner companies to receive job assignments and collaborate on projects.
partners.addAPartnerByEnteringTheirPartnerCodeToS: Add a partner by entering their partner code to start receiving job assignments.
partners.partnersCanAssignJobsDirectlyToYouThroug: Partners can assign jobs directly to you through the platform.
partners.youllNeedAValidPartnerCodeToEstablishACo: You'll need a valid partner code to establish a connection.
partners.youCanRemoveAPartnerAtAnyTimeButThisWill: You can remove a partner at any time, but this will affect future job assignments.
partners.enterThePartnerCodeProvidedByTheCompanyY: Enter the partner code provided by the company you want to connect with.
partners.areYouSureYouWantToRemoveThisPartner: Are you sure you want to remove this partner?

addBank.addBankDescription: Add your bank account to receive payments for completed jobs.
addBank.addBankAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to add this bank account?
addBank.bankNameShouldOnlyContainLettersSpacesHy: Bank name should only contain letters, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes
addBank.accountHolderNameShouldOnlyContainLetter: Account holder name should only contain letters, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes
addBank.invalidIbanFormatFrenchIbanShouldStartWi: Invalid IBAN format. French IBAN should start with FR followed by 25 alphanumeric characters
addBank.invalidBicSwiftFormatShouldBe8Or11Charac: Invalid BIC/SWIFT format. Should be 8 or 11 characters, e.g. BNPAFRPP or BNPAFRPPXXX
addBank.yourBankAccountHasBeenSuccessfullyAdded: Your bank account has been successfully added
addBank.enterBankName: Enter bank name (e.g., BNP Paribas, Société Générale)
addBank.forFrenchBankAccountsBothIbanAndBicSwift: For French bank accounts, both IBAN and BIC/SWIFT code are required. Your information is securely stored and will be used for receiving payments for completed jobs.

help.contactSupportDescription: Contact support for any questions or issues you may have.
help.contactSupportDescription3: You can contact us by phone or email.
help.contactSupportDescription5: You can contact us by phone or email.
help.thisWouldOpenALiveChatWithSupportInAReal: This would open a live chat with support in a real app.
help.thisWouldOpenThePageInARealApp: This would open the {{title}} page in a real app.
help.howDoIUpdateMyAvailability: How do I update my availability?
help.goToProfileAvailabilityToSetYourWorkingH: Go to Profile > Availability to set your working hours for each day of the week.
help.howDoIAcceptAJobRequest: How do I accept a job request?
help.jobRequestsAppearInTheJobsTabTapOnAJobRe: Job requests appear in the Jobs tab. Tap on a job request and select 'Accept' to take the job.
help.howDoICollectStockForAJob: How do I collect stock for a job?
help.openTheJobDetailsAndTapOnCollectStockFol: Open the job details and tap on 'Collect Stock'. Follow the instructions to scan and collect each item.
help.howDoIPaidForCompletedJobs: How do I get paid for completed jobs?
help.paymentsAreProcessedAutomaticallyAfterAJ: Payments are processed automatically after a job is marked as complete and verified by the customer.
help.howDoIConnectWithAPartnerCompany: How do I connect with a partner company?
help.goToProfilePartnersAndTapAddPartnerEnter: Go to Profile > Partners and tap 'Add Partner'. Enter the partner code provided by the company.
help.areYouSureYouWantToDeleteYourAccountThis: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
help.yourAccountHasBeenSuccessfullyDeleted: Your account has been successfully deleted.
help.cookiePolicyDescription: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze traffic. By clicking 'Accept', you consent to our use of cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time.
